mapper.select: select s.store_name, image_link from Product as p inner Join Menu as m on p.pro_seq = m.pro_seq inner join Store as s on m.store_seq = s.store_seq where name like #{keyword};

select s.store_name, s.image_link, s.store_number, s.location, p.name, m.price from Product as p inner Join Menu as m on p.pro_seq = m.pro_seq inner join Store as s on m.store_seq = s.store_seq where s.store_name = #{name} ;
mapper.update: update product set name=#{product_name} , category=#{category} where pro_seq=#{product_seq};
